pages.text: A whole log contains far more energy than is needed for druidic rituals. The bark of a tree will be sufficient for most purposes, and is abudant in supply.$(br2)Breaking a log with a $(l:apparatus/knives)Knife$() will drop bark instead of the log.

pages.title: Oak Bark
pages.text: Dropped when breaking an Oak Log with a $(l:apparatus/knives)Knife.$()

pages.title: Birch Bark
pages.text: Dropped when breaking an Birch Log with a $(l:apparatus/knives)Knife.$()
